import React from 'react' export default class PerformSaleComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { itemType: '', brand: '', itemModel: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: '', unitPrice: '', generation: '', cart: [], laptopBrandVisibility: true } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } inventory = require('../../testData/inventory') handleChange = async (evt) => { const value = evt.target.value; const name = evt.target.name; //console.log(this.data) await this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value }); } laptopBrand = () => { return
} addItem = (item) => { console.log(item) let tempCart = this.state.cart tempCart.map(itm => { if (itm.itemDescription === item.itemDescription) { //let newQty = itm.quantity + 1 itm.quantity = itm.quantity+1 } else { item.quantity = 1 } }) this.setState({ ...this.state, cart: tempCart }); console.log(this.state.cart) } printInventory = (neededItemType, neededBrand) => { return this.inventory.map((item, index) => { if (item.itemType === neededItemType && this.state.brand === '') { // this.setState({ // ...this.state, // brand: '' // }); return {index + 1} {item.itemDescription} {item.quantity} } else if (item.itemType === neededItemType && item.brand === this.state.brand) { return {index + 1} {item.itemDescription} {item.quantity} } }) } render() { return
Search Item Needed For Purchase
{ this.laptopBrand()}

Current Inventory
{this.printInventory(this.state.itemType,)}
# Item Description Current Stock Selling Price Action
Cart

} }
